name: Diescapades
description:
(GMTK GAME JAM 2022 SUBMISSION)
THE STORY SO FAR...

You are Diceon, a die imprisoned by the casino owners for helping someone out of their bad losing streak. In this dungeon, your only hope out is to use your trusty suited weapons, but beware! This dungeon is cursed with the essence of randomness! Random rooms! Random classes! You don't even know which trusty Special Ability you can use next! At least you can find more scattered around to use...

You gotta get out of here!

CLASSES! (Primary and Secondary)
Hearts- Heart Bash and Heart Block
Spades- Spade Thrust and Snake-Eyes Dodge
Diamonds- Diamond Bullet and Diamond Spread
Clubs- The Clubs Club and Clubbering Smash

CONTROLS (Only supports keyboard and mouse)

Esc - Quit
W - Up
S - Down
D - Right
A - Left
Space - Dice Dash
Left Shift - Use Special
Left Click - Primary Attack
Right Click - Secondary Attack

Created by GlassLanternGames:

Garrison Trahant, Joshua Burk, and Brett Steele

Music used from opengameart.org
"Jazz" - Spring Enterprises

Special thanks to Mark Brown and GMTK for showing us that making fun games isn't merely a dream, even first-timers like us can make something.

Most of all, a VERY special thanks to everyone who played this first game. You all made this effort and experience worthwhile!
